Module Vuex

type 'state action_input = {
state : 'state Mjs.t;
getters : ('state Mjs.t -> ('state Mjs.t -> Mjs.any) Mjs.table -> Mjs.any) Mjs.table;
commit : ?⁠payload:Mjs.any -> string -> unit;
dispatch : ?⁠payload:Mjs.any -> string -> Mjs.unit_promise Mjs.t;
root_state : Mjs.any option;
root_getters : (Mjs.any -> (Mjs.any -> Mjs.any) Mjs.table -> Mjs.any) Mjs.table option;
}

input for actions

type 'payload mutation = {
name : string;
payload : 'payload;
}

mutation type for subscribe

module Internal : sig ... end

internal JS module

type 'state options = 'state Internal.options = {
o_state : 'state Mjs.t;
o_getters : ('state Mjs.t -> Mjs.any) Mjs.table_cons;
mutations : ('state Mjs.t -> Mjs.any -> unit) Mjs.table_cons;
actions : ('state action_input -> Mjs.any -> unit) Mjs.table_cons;
plugins : Mjs.any list option;
strict : bool option;
devtools : bool option;
modules : Mjs.top Internal.dynamic_cs_options Mjs.t Mjs.table_cons;
namespaced : bool option;
}

store constructor options

type 'state store = 'state Internal.instance_js Mjs.t

JS store object

type 'state module_obj = 'state Internal.dynamic_cs_options Mjs.t

JS module object

val empty : 'state Mjs.t -> 'state options

empty constructor options

val make : 'state options -> 'state store

main make store function

val make_module : 'state options -> 'state module_obj

make module store function

val state : 'state store -> 'state Mjs.t

get state of store

val get : 'state store -> string -> Mjs.any

get value of one of the getters

val commit : ?⁠payload:Mjs.any -> ?⁠root:bool -> 'state store -> string -> unit

commit to the state of the store

val dispatch : ?⁠payload:Mjs.any -> ?⁠root:bool -> 'state store -> string -> (Mjs.unit_promise Mjs.t -> 'async) -> 'async

dispatch to the state of the store

val replace_state : 'state store -> 'state Mjs.t -> unit

replace the state of the store

val subscribe : 'state store -> ('a mutation -> 'state Mjs.t -> unit) -> unit

hook for mutation subscription

val subscribe_action : 'state store -> ('a mutation -> 'state Mjs.t -> unit) -> unit

hook for action subscription

val register_module : 'state store -> string -> Mjs.top options -> unit

register a new module to the store

val unregister_module : 'state store -> string -> unit

unregister a module of the store

module existence

module type Tables_S = sig ... end
